definition: having two or more independent but harmonically related melodic parts sounding together
details:
adjective
- having two or more independent but harmonically related melodic parts sounding together
= synonyms: contrapuntal
- of or relating to or characterized by polyphony
= example: of or relating to or characterized by polyphony
= synonyms: polyphonous
- having two or more phonetic values
= example: having two or more phonetic values
